TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed AudioBalanceFadeType extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: An enumeration whose values specify whether balance/fade manipulation should always have a gain of less than 1.0.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype AudioToolbox.AudioBalanceFadeType EqualPower = unsigned int32(1)

Docs.summary: Overall loudness remains constant, but gain may be as high as 1.414 (+3dB).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype AudioToolbox.AudioBalanceFadeType MaxUnityGain = unsigned int32(0)

Docs.summary: Overall gain is not allowed to exceed 1.0.
